      • decrement

        public static void decrement(java.lang.String collection,
             org.bson.types.ObjectId userId,
             int fromLimit,
             int toLimit)
                      throws DatabaseException
        Decrements all order fields from (and including) 'fromLimit' to (and including) 'toLimit' by one. If either one is zero, only the other condition will be considered.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

        public static void increment(java.lang.String collection,

             int fromLimit,
             int toLimit)
                      throws DatabaseException
        Increments all order fields from (and including) 'fromLimit' to (and including) 'toLimit' by one. If either one is zero, only the other condition will be considered.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
